altTitles.ja: 大きい女の子は好きですか？

description.en: Tachibana Souta is a bit of a multi-talented freeter who gets by from one part-time job to the next, his standout characteristic being that he's a bit short. One day he's roped by his older sister into 'serving' their college's volleyball team, of which she's a member. She also happens to be at least 6 and 1/2 ft. tall, as do the rest of the team's members who take quite the interest in Souta.

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!
100 Short Manga about Types of and Behavior in Yuri Relationships
On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

description.en: Kazuto Ayanokoji is an ordinary high school boy. He spends his days playing online games as a hobby. One day, he discovers the true identity of a friend who is so close to him that they are married in-game. It turns out to be a cool idol from the same class, Rinka Mizuki. As Rinka tries to act as his wife in real life, Kazuto is forced to lead a dizzying life.
description.ja: 平凡な男子高校生・綾小路和斗には嫁がいる。ただし趣味のネトゲ世界で。ところが結婚相手の少女リンの正体は、学校のクラスメイトで人気アイドルの『水樹凛香』で!? 正体がバレて関係も終わり――かと思いきや、凛香は現実でも和斗の「嫁」として振る舞い始めて……。
description.vi: Ayanokouji Kazuto là một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường. Cậu có sở thích là chơi game vào thời gian rảnh của mình. Một ngày, cậu phát hiện ra danh tính thật của người bạn thân mà cậu đã kết hôn trong game. Người đó không ai khác chính là Rinka Mizuki, một idol và cũng là một người bạn cùng lớp của cậu. Trong khi Mizuki Rinka cố gắng để cư xử với cậu như một người vợ, cậu phải trải qua một cuộc sống hằng ngày mệt mỏi.

description.en: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space

A world where only those with innate talent can become adventurers who conquer dungeons.
The world defined "Nagi" as a porter who cannot become an adventurer.

But if you clear a dungeon, doesn't that make you an adventurer?

Combat skills: 0! Survival abilities: Max level!
The dungeon conquest story of the all-purpose porter, Nagi, defying fate!

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

description.en:
High school girls Sara Himekawa, Rin Kohinata, and Yuna Takamori are called “S-class beauties,” admired by everyone for their unparalleled beauty. While the school is abuzz with questions about the mysterious guy that the girls are talking about, Haruya Akasaki, a quiet boy in the class, is feeling anxious. In fact, the subject of the girls' talk is Haruya! He definitely does not want to draw that much attention at school, so he tries to make the girls lose interest in him, but it all backfires and…

This is a school harem comedy between a plain guy and “S-class beauties."

クラスのマドンナたちの話題はすべて俺？

description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

Initially, Sumiko rejected the AI boyfriend.  
However, being subject to his constant love gradually leads her to acknowledge him…  
  
A hot topic on Twitter and pixiv! A love comedy between a handsome AI and an unpopular woman begins ♡  
  
Note: the series is marked as "Cancelled", but it is closer to "Discontinued/Abandoned", as it has not been updated since December 2018.

description.en:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

(Source: Magazine Pocket)
description.ja: 小さな田舎町で農家として暮らす三田仁は、ある朝自分の田んぼに女騎士が倒れているのを発見する。セラフィムと名乗る彼女は、どうやら異世界からやって来たらしい。この世界の知識もなく行き場もない。そんな彼女を見かねて一緒に暮らすことを提案するも、どうやら周りからはセラフィムが俺の嫁だと思われてるようで…!? お日様の下の農作業と新鮮素材のお料理。そして美人女騎士と送る、のんびり田舎スローライフ開幕！
description.vi: Một ngày nọ, tôi ra thăm ruộng, thì vô tình gặp một nữ hiệp sĩ đang nằm trong bãi ruộng nhà tôi. Cô ta tự xưng là Seraphim, là kị sĩ tới từ một đế quốc viễn tưởng nào đó. Có vẻ như cô ấy nói thật, vì cô ta không có bất cứ kiến thức gì về thế giới này. Do không thể để mặc cô ấy như vậy, tôi đành đưa cô ấy về nhà chăm sóc. Và do ở vùng quê người ta biết hết dù chỉ là một sự thay đổi nhỏ nhất, người ta bắt đầu đồn cô ấy là vợ tôi...

description.en:
Yagami Sayuri is the student council vice president, and her demanding president hates the fact that boys are in their school at all. 

There is a school legend that if a maiden offers her panties to the goddess statue in the courtyard, the goddess will help solve her problems. The actual problem-solving power, though, is with the student council, which monitors the statue's panty offerings. The president often insists Sayuri help solve the girls' problems in her secret identity of Mystic Heart, a scantily clad protector of the school's peace. Most of the students just think of Mystic Heart as a masochistic pervert. 

Sayuri usually ends up naked and humiliated in front of boys, and the shame helps her transform into her sadistic personality. In this form, she can beat up the boys and pee on them. 

The student council helps girls through many troubles, from misunderstandings between friends to peeping toms!
description.ja: 私立朝葵高校には、一つの伝説があった。中庭の女神像に処女の脱ぎたてパンティを捧げると、女神が救いの手を差し伸べるという。そして、女神に代わって正義を実行する者がいた。その名はミスティック・ハート、またの名をドM仮面という。羞恥心のパラメーターがMAXに達すると、変態の血が覚醒し、人間の潜在能力を極限まで引き出した究極変態超人「ドS仮面」へと変身するのであった。＜新感覚＞学園変態ヒロイン、ここに誕生!!

Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

description.en:
As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.fr: My Love Story With Yamada-Kun at LVL 999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?
___
The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

title.en: Hakui no Tora wa Gokudou de Zetsurin

altTitles.ja: 白衣の虎は極道で絶倫～闇医者ヤクザに毎晩溺愛されて…～

altTitles.en: The Tiger in the White Coat is an Outstanding Yakuza

description.en:
“I can’t believe my virginity is being taken like this――!”
Momo, a former track athlete, can no longer run due to an injury she sustained during her career. While her treatments aren’t progressing, Dr. Dan encourages her, saying, “Let’s overcome this together.” Moved by his strong words, Momo begins to trust him, only to later discover that Dan is actually the underboss of a yakuza gang controlling the underground world! As soon as she learns his secret, he reveals his true nature, saying, “After treatment, I need women to calm myself down.”
What she thought was a one-night fling turns into being loved deeply and passionately every day ― in ways she never imagined!

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)
description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

Wilcome, wilcome!  
This is a 4-koma about a cafe run by two avian sisters. Originally a oneshot, before winning a newbie contest and being awarded a serialization.

Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.vi: Thế giới game hòa làm một với hiện thực, mọi quy tắc bị phá vỡ,nhân loại tiến vào thời đại toàn dân chuyển chức. Chỉ có trở thành chuyển chức giả! Thăng cấp biến mạnh! Mới có thể bước lên đỉnh cao của đời người! Vào ngày chuyển chức,Lâm Mặc thức tỉnh chức nghiệp ẩn độc nhất Tử Linh Pháp Sư. Từ đây Chỉ cần vật triệu hoàn không chết thì Thì đồng nghĩa Lâm Mặc cũng sẽ không bao giờ chết. "Ta ngồi trên hài cốt thần tọa, đi lại giữa sự sống và cái chết"
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

altTitles.ja: かわいい後輩に言わされたい

altTitles.en: I Want to be Teased by a Cute Junior

altTitles.zh-hk: 可愛後輩想讓我說出口

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero ser provocado por uma kouhai fofa

description.en: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
description.ja: まったく素直じゃない後輩・守山ちゃんは、自分にアプローチさせようと野洲先輩を挑発したり、時には大胆にアクションしたり…!?
description.pt-br: Yasu gosta da sua kouhai, Moriyama, que é ao mesmo tempo extremamente assertiva, inexpressiva e extremamente passiva-agressiva.

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

description.en:
A gate appears in Tokyo's Ginza district sometime in the 21st century. From the gate pours out monsters, knights from middle-age Europe, and other fantasy-like beings, and they kill many of the citizens of Tokyo. This event is known as the Ginza Incident.  
The government sends a small group of soldiers from the Japanese Self-Defense Forces to the alternate world beyond the gate. Led by otaku soldier Youji, they find that the villages in the world are being attacked by a dragon. An elf girl who is a survivor from the dragon's rampage joins the group in their travels across the dangerous new world.  
  
 [Official Thai](https://shopee.co.th/Gate-%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B4-%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B0-1-10-i.30847586.4202197419)

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B2%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88_%E8%87%AA%E8%A1%9B%E9%9A%8A_%E5%BD%BC%E3%81%AE%E5%9C%B0%E3%81%AB%E3%81%A6%E3%80%81%E6%96%AF%E3%81%8F%E6%88%A6%E3%81%88%E3%82%8A)
description.vi: Một cánh cổng kì lạ xuất hiện ở quận Ginza của thành phố Tokyo vào giữa thế kỉ 21. Từ cánh cổng đó đổ ra những con quái vật, những chiến binh từ thời Trung Âu, những thứ chỉ có trong tưởng tượng khác và chúng đã giết chết rất nhiều người dân của Tokyo. Sự kiện này được biết đến với cái tên Ginza Incident. Chính phủ đã gửi một nhóm nhỏ các binh sĩ của Lực lượng Phòng vệ Nhật Bản (thay cho lực lượng quân đội) để đến thế giới bên kia cánh cổng. Được dẫn dắt bởi người lính otaku, và họ đã nhìn thấy một ngôi làng đang bị tấn công bỏi một con rồng. Một tiểu tinh nữ đã sống sót sau cơn thịnh nộ của con rồng đã gia nhập vào nhóm lính và cùng nhau thám hiểm thế giới mới đầy nguy hiểm

description.en:
This work takes its own route from the original "Oshi no Ko" manga from chapter 158. It portrays a daily life of Aqua and Ruby.

What whould happen if Fuyuko Niino actually stabbed Ruby Hoshino, being envious of young idol's success?

altTitles.ja: スティグマタ─聖痕捜査─

description.en: Asako Minami has a "unique constitution." He senses the lingering thoughts of murder victims, and experiences the circumstances under which they died with his own body in a reaction similar to stigmata. This proves useful in solving difficult cases with the Metropolitan Police Department's Special Investigations Unit Six. Asako's partner is the reserved Superintendent Kuroiwa Hiroto, rising through the MPD ranks despite doubting his own abilities.

title.en: Shijou de Katta Dorei Elf ni Oratsukareru

altTitles.ja: 市場で買った奴隷エルフにオラつかれる

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichiba de katta dorei Erufu ni ora tsukareru

altTitles.en: I Bought A Rude Elf Slave At The Market

description.en: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

After having lived a life full of misfortune, Siegbert has been reincarnated as a result of an accident. His new family is so warm. He can't believe he was unlucky in his previous life.  

He thought he would live a peaceful life this time, but unfortunately, his luck level is abnormally high and his luckiness attracts "chance" and can make whatever his wish come true if he can tackle these "chances". However, these "chances" comes with a price, Siegbert and those around him has to face formidable enemies and a life-or-death situation.  

Siegbert is determined to beat all of the odds with his abnormally high magic power and appraisal eye that he got after reincarnating to protect those around him.
description.id:
Siegbert yang selalu tertimpa kemalangan di kehidupan sebelumnya, sekarang ia tereinkarnasi ke dunia lain.
Ia tidak mengira keluarga barunya merupakan keluarga yang hangat karena kemalangan yang ia hadapi di kehidupan sebelumnya.
Akan tetapi, apakah ia akan tetap dihujani oleh kemalangan bahkan setelah tereinkarnasi?

description.en:
Who died at that time... Which one?

John is red-haired and freckled. His only pride is that he is a close friend of the school's popular twins, Jekyll and Hyde. The twins always pretended to be each other, but suddenly one of the twins died. Who was left... Which one!?

The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

description.en: A squad of soldiers receive a distress signal from an abandoned mining facility where they soon have to face dangerous creatures in a battle of survival.
High school home ec expert Tenichi earns extra money with a part-time job cleaning houses. But one day, Himari, the owner and model of the popular cosmetics brand Hima Riz, transfers into his class.
description.ja: 家事代行で家計を支える家守殿一のクラスに転校してきたのは、コスメブランドの社長兼モデルの女子のカリスマ・美野妃眞理！
description.tl: Si Tenichi, isang eksperto sa home economics sa high school, ay kumikita ng dagdag na pera sa pamamagitan ng part-time na trabaho sa paglilinis ng mga bahay. Pero isang araw, si Himari, ang may-ari at modelo ng sikat na cosmetics brand na Hima Riz, ay lumipat sa kanyang klase. Salubungin ang isang romantikong komedya na puno ng kalokohan sa pagitan ng isang dalagang presidente ng kumpanya at isang binatilyong tagalinis ng bahay!

description.en:
A certain town where rumors of the occult have suddenly been increasing.  
  
Sei, who lives in this town, encounters a strange girl. The girl wrongly thinks Sei is hitting on her and ends up tagging along with him. However, as it turns out, the strange girl is a certain legendary existence…

Sharks don't have lungs, but they do have to breathe oxygen to survive. Instead of breathing air, though, sharks get oxygen from the water that surrounds them. So they have to move around, if they stop moving for a while, they sink into the water and die, So Sharks have to move and move constantly from birth to death. The same goes for you. If you want to survive, keep moving, then you will be the best hunter… like a shark.

My Wife Became An Elementary School Student.

description.en: The trials and tribulations of a single father, who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife, who perished a decade before.
description.es:
Las pruebas y adversidades de un padre soltero, que un día se encuentra con la reencarnación de su difunta esposa, que murió una década antes.  
  


---

Links  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yayu_murata)
description.es-la: Nijima Keisuke es un hombre asalariado, vivía felizmente junto a su esposa y a su hija, hasta que un día su esposa fallece y él se derrumba. Siendo ahora un padre soltero, tuvo que esforzarse más por su hija pero perdía el camino y su estilo de vida se volvió muy deplorable, hasta que un día aparece una niña diciendo ser la reencarnación de su esposa y se propone ayudarlo para cambiar y corregir su lamentable situación actual.
description.pt-br: As provações e tribulações de um pai solteiro, que um dia encontra a reencarnação de sua falecida esposa.
